Summary: Women@AWS Singapore and Girls in Tech have partnered to create a mentoring program in Singapore with the goal of promoting diversity and inclusion in the tech industry. The program will run for 10 weeks, from end-July to beginning of October, and mentors and mentees are expected to have a minimum of 6 sessions, with at least 3 in-person. Mentors are assigned on a 1-to-1 basis and will be matched with mentees based on their background and interests. Mentees should be university students in their final year, recent graduates in technology, or currently working in the tech industry. There are limited slots available and mentees will be notified of their selection by end-July. The program aims to accelerate professional and personal
